alert.note: Alert for Green Mountains and Rattlesnake Range (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued April 02 at 5:46AM MDT until April 04 at 6:00PM MDT by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 11 PM THIS EVENING TO 6 PM MDT TUESDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 12 to 20 inches, with locally higher amounts possible. * WHERE...Green Mountains and Rattlesnake Range. * WHEN...From 11 PM this evening to 6 PM MDT Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible, especially Monday night through Tuesday morning. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow may melt during the day, especially on paved surfaces, resulting in accumulations less than forecasted totals.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
